name: Safe-Cracker
overview: Published in RUN-o-thek 1986/11, in the German version of Games Commodores Play and as a game of "The Big 100" collection, in this game you are a secret service spy and must recover documents stolen by foreign agents. The secret documents are in a safe that you have to crack. You have an advanced tool to do it. You will hear a click when you either have the number directly or this just happened in the combination.
